thread.title: Barack Obama's 'folks' working under Trump blasted for 'causing CHAOS in White House'
thread.title_full: Barack Obama's 'folks' working under Trump blasted for 'causing CHAOS in White House'

title: Barack Obama's 'folks' working under Trump blasted for 'causing CHAOS in White House'
text:
AFP/Getty Images 1 of 29 The White House Christmas Tree in the Blue Room of the White House in Washington, DC, November 29, 2016. 
"In reference to the General Flynn situation itself, there was nothing illegal that was done there." 
Appearing shocked as to how she swiftly evaded his direct questions, Davis pressed Ms Hughes to provide an answer as to why Trump is getting away with “saying stuff that is not true”. 
But looking increasingly annoyed, Ms Hughes took a sharp turn and blasted Obama: "There is definitely a lot more chaos that has gone on in this administration than ones in the past. 
"The main reason is, President Trump kept a lot of folks from the Obama administration with their job. That's where a lot of these leaks are happening. 
"And until President Trump goes in and takes out all of them who obviously do not have the American interest best at heart... we’re going to continue to see these leaks and chaos that are distracting the president from his actual mission..." BBC BBC Newsnight's Evan Davis tried to mock the journalist 
Backed into the corner of his seat, Evan Davis looked physically tired and blown away after her one minute rant, forcing him to end the interview. 
Davis had put up a brave fight before her savage attack on the former President who has been pictured enjoying his time away from the White House. Related articles
